values:
Heya peeps :(
I fell realli realli lousy and i cant get to sleep :(

Everyday i wake up thinking "what will i do today?" but i always kno the answer... NOTHING MUCH!

Im watchin Meet The parents but its realli annoying me because it keeps stopping in places and wont play!! :(

I realli miss Cookie atm :) Laura was calling him and i was like yea but hes mine! I love him too bits and i wouldnt change me going out wiv him!  Hes lovely and i will always love him!! <3! 

Ya know what else i miss right now? FREINDS! Not one person from skool has txtd me to see how i was, rang me to ask me to go places :( NOT ONE! It would be nice to be asked how i am - which is fuckin lousy!  I have a broken ankle and now with mi cast off its realli painful trying to WALK AGAIN! What is the point me being friends with u lot if u dont take any notice of how i am!?!?  No i cant walk atm but that was tuesday i got mi cast off! Its been a week and a day! U had that long to ask me!

I wanna say thanx to Sarah for bein a perfect angel at this point in time :) Shes been here when all i needed is a hug and tellin me its all gonna be alright!  Thats all i need :)  Even her  house is an outing to me!

I would just love for one of u to come round...see how i am...txt me...ring me...even on MSN! I was stuck in mi house for 3 1/2 weeks - never goin out neway! Stayin downstiars in 4 walls isnt that gr8! Laura thank you for coming over :) i realli needed it - but saying those things wasnt nice u kno!

Well im gonna stay on here all night because i cant get too sleep :(

Luv ya - NOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Well mi cast has finalli come off!! Its all battered and bruised :O sick i know! I felt like a bush! UHH ONMG i must shave ma legs - im gonna puke! LOL!! I miss mi pink cast :( never mind!!
Im listenin to Hush by LL Cool J - lush lyrics - i feel the mood which is weird :)
Katy missed dance tonite because we got back late and mi dad n mum went shopping for card and stuff for the cards business :) - i get paid :) - he he!
Now im just chattin :) to Danny, Kaz, Ross n Stu! He he well i best get off

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Well im talkin to DANNY atm - hes gorgeous(but not as much as u cookie ;)he he <3 u!)! 
Yesterday was sooo boring because i was stuck in the house all day bein bored.  But it was ok because i spent some of the day with Sarah catching up on what we have missed out on in ages :)
Today was cool even tho i didnt get to do much.  I got up at 11 coz Sarah wanted me to come out...which i did to find out that they were off to the life centre :( and i cudnt go coz i had the bloody dentist.
Well once i got to the dentist i was in and out...she thought i was dong very well but one last appointment - YES - hopefulli!
Thenm i stayed at Sarah's talking to Ashley, Cookie, Loui, Jennifer Henderson and hu else?? i dunno...cant rememba!
Well im now talkin to Danny - hu is dead canny to talk to - JUST LIKE U STU! - hes gr8 company!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Today has been realli realli borin! I havent realli done much except played on my computer as fuckin usual, which is BORIN!!!
Katy and mum went on a LONG walk today! As if i could do that!  They walked to Dianty Toys to get some more stuff for the cards that we make :) family business lmao!
I got the dentist tomorra so Sarah's day will have to wait till i get back from the death seat :P Margaret will be like "what ya done?" LMAO! What does it look like?
Im online with Cookie, Stu, Tom, Lauren and Dani

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Today has been fun!
Sarah came home after last night and she was grounded because of gabby's mum...but shes not grounded anymore :)! Gabby's grounded for 6 weeks...which i know is horrible!
When she got back we hung outside as we havent done in absolutely ages :P! We just talked about boyfriends and stuff which we havent done in a while :)  Its been a lush day tho to be hangin outside.  But OMG adam and greg are obsessed with watchin us messin on.  They just sit on the wall starin...so alice shouted and they were like :S and jumped down.
Me and Sarah and Katy were sittin in Sazzies room tryin to watch White Noise but it didnt work so were gonna have a girly day then im having one of mi own lol! We went downstairs to tlk on MSN to Cookie, Stu, Loui + his bro(nice), ashley and scott.
I got home and fell asleep then woke up at 11.10 :O i kno im not well agen :(

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!

Chitty Chitty Bang Bang Cast List:
Katy - Caractacus Potts
Annie - Jemima Potts
Andrew - Jeremey Potts
Chloe - Grandpa

Mica - Truly Scrumptious
Dannielle - Lord Scrumptious

Lauren - Toymaker

Baron - Amanda
Baroness - Alexa

And all the lil ones!

Well Chitty Chitty Bang Bang was funni as anything :)!  I sat with Lynz, Sarah n Gemz.  It was so funni we sat down then Gemz just started singin out loud - for no reason and kaitlins mam and family just turned and laughed - gemz not on this planet bless a!  You know on the day we need eyeliner, lynz didnt have herz lmao! Soo not like Lynz!  We had a good laugh before the show had started :)
OMG at the start katy had to pretend to fall off her scooter but it looked VERY realistic i jumped and was expecting her to cry lol!  She suprised me today because she can actualli sing...but apparently people have been bitching about her because she got the lead but... SHES FABBIE!!!
Dannielle totalli mucked her lines and stuff up but she made it funnier than it was supposed to be lol - i still luv ya dani lol!
AWW bless andrew! Hes been mega ill - like me - and he was ill today...but like always he did the show.  Hes a brave boy... i wouldnt of done that if i was ill :) Plus luke waws ill too on wednesday.
I got to meet and see loadz of peeps who i havent seen since before Christmas :O but ive spoken to them on MSN as usual.
Dani and Lauren were there! Dani your Sam is f*****n lush! ;) heya sam! Dani it was gr8 seeing you IN this show, not bein ill. None of your insides over the Studio floor this time? lol! (like i said- luv ya realli)
Lauren and Christine it was luvley to see you - i feel kinda bad i dont see u often as i should do!  I may come and see you soon tho!!
Rebekah - OMG shes the gr8st lil one ive known in a long time! Shes absolutely luvely.  Her lil bro nathan is soo sweet but i kno he aint shy!
Ceris and Brooke - How could i forget?  Ceris is soo sweet, shes always drawing me things.  She was waiting all break for me and then i gave her a hug, it wasnt on purpose i was busy talkin to Dani and Sam. brooke too, and their mom who is canni as out!
Then i got home to see Sazzie! Shes the gr8st m8! BEST FREINDS 4EVA! I went over hers to see her and talk about boyfriend stuff.  We both have perfect boyfriends...im meeting micheal on sunday so thats gr8! Were both in love and whenever we fight we think....why? Our fight lasted 4 hours today...coz we were both out and we have no cred lol!
Dave is giving me Science tuition bless im! Aww i luv ya hun!!!
Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
:( Ive been ill :(

Tommorra im off to watch the show of Chitty Chitty Bang Bang! I got to see Dani, lauren and Chloe again after ages! Which was nice!

Im gettin bit pissed off wiv Sarah coz she has been speakin to sum1 from mi skool and a can tell shes been a bitch about me :@!

Well best go!

xxx

Heya peeps!

Well mi life is just getting worse.  I feel so down atm and i just feel nothing can get better.

Skool is just a waste of time for me because i dont like turning up to try to do lessons when people are ust laughing at me, taking the piss, calling me names, spreading shit behind my back...Well u kno...now ive had enough.  I cant take it anymore...i try to stay strong infront of ppl!  When people call me i do stick up for myself but people just carry on.  They think oh she wont keep sticking up for herself so carry on.  I do try but i just get so tired and sick of shouting.

In year 7 i felt on top of the world - no worries.  Well i didnt need to have any.  I had loadz of friends - who i wouldnt dare talk to now.  I used to be m8s wiv all tha lads n lasses from the class but now i h8 some of them and like talk to a few of them but the rest - they would probably snap my head off for talking to them.  Well *************** is a bitch! Now everywhere i turn its big nose this big nose that! I dont want it anymore!!

I just try to move on - and feel like myself but its realli hard when im being put down all the time.  I feel like people(hu i wnt name) are just spreadin shit behind my back and i dont want it.  People hu i have trusted, just go and tell secrets which ive sworn ppl not to say.  It hurts me that ppl wud do that - when they are supposed to be my friend!!

I just want my life back to the way it was!!

When Hanisa left it broke my heart.  people may see thats soppy but it did...how wud u feel if ur best friend for years just moved to the other side of the world.  Then u only seeing her once every 2 years if your lucky.  We did everything together! We had this little plan we did every weekend.  On friday she used to come and sleep at my house, then on saturday lucy and han used to stay the day then i went to Hanisa's house to sleep then EVERY sunday we went bowling.  We were soo close.  We talked about everything...i could tell her anything and knowing that she wouldnt tell anyone.  I feel i cant trust many people. When they break my trust it takes ages to trust them again.  People think im a push over...well im not! 

Kaz and Kaylz:>4 u!
I know i get jealous of u guys its just whenever i see you guys together it reminds me of me and hanisa.  I kno u think im being nasty...im not! Its just i miss her sooo much.  This sounds soo soppy but im realli depressed and i dont know what to do with myself.

Im trying to look into the future - with ma exams and that but i can hardly concentrate with me being depressed.  I try to block everything out...but it just gets me more depressed when everythins lurking in the back of ma mind!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

I just want to show every1 what mi life is like! What i have to pout thru...everyday fuckin day of mi life!

I try to go to skool for some fun wiv mi friends...but how can i do that> When i have
- Barkell
- Tom
- Luke
- laura
- Kev
- Tha chava lads
- Bethany fuckin hall
- nicola H
- SIMON FATTTTTT PIE SHAGS SOFA NICHOLLS
ALL ON MI BAK! Callin me big nose and stuff! Well u know wat im fuckin sick of it! Y ME???? YES I KNOW mi nose is broken and it luks wierd but it shudnt bother u! ITS MI FUCKIN LIFE!
It fuckin bothers me!
Yea i have the perfect bf and a few "good friends" and i say gud becoz some BULLSHIT! behind mi bak! AND i kno wat u say about me! I just want everyone to kno wat HELL im in! No1 understands wat i have to put up wiv! They say ignore them...theyll get over it...but guess wat! 5 years lata im still in HELL!!
U HAVE NO IDEA WAT I GO THRU! THIS IS JUST PART OF IT!
Excuse me i have to take mi anti-depressants!

Becki
xxx

Im soo depressed!


Im sick of skool...sick of ppl!

Yea so wat mi nose is broken but i dont kno y u hassle me!!!!!!!
Mi lifes shit without everyone shouting at me!!!

I hate mi life....y cant everyone leave me be! I h8 u all!

Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
    Well thats it! Ive finished skool finalli! Im absolutley chuffed!
    OMG yesterday was so much fun at Drama but skool was a bore as usual! I had Business in the mornin for 2 hours wiv Emma Johnson...Wen duz she ever shut up? just she sleep talk? Anyway that was soo borin but i caught up all the work and managed to finish the work in class i had to do...he he! Then german was ok...got to see Jemma C and Sarah W and Jemma E and have a gd laff spec wiv Luke(i didnt say that) but ya kna :P After Lunch(in ICT) i went to maths were i had NOTHING to do coz ppl were doin their exam papers but i 4got mine...well i didnt kno :)  Then in science wiv Mrs Gardener zzzzzz as usual!!
    Anyway Drama! I turned up to Drama Auditions and guess hu was sittin in the corner...Hollie and Lauren. Was a nice suprise...but i was a bit :S coz Hollie cansing, lauren can act and miranda s can dance...but i did well i think! I had to move to the other room so i was like uhh :@! In my room there was kate - mi partner for tha nite, Ashleigh W, Amanda, Sarah M - bless ya chick, Rachel - hu completley went into Dame mode LMAO!!
    Today was orite actualli!  Science wiv Mr Bowles was realli borin...learning about clones - hu wud wnt to clone sheep? they look the same! Then Maths which was orite.  We were going over our exam...which i need to revise next time:
* Probablity! *
* Shapes - Im crap at em *
    Then english which me and Ash went into Mrs Peggs room for ICT, i did my english project which i didnt get to finish :S but if i do it for the foirst monday back i may have a chance :P! Then i stayed in ICT at lunch! Then i went into ICT for science...i didnt miss much wiv Mr Lane's class.  Anyway in ICT i did my work and i was 10 marks off a B!!! well that be 5 marks if he counts the work i did today! SO NEAR YET SOO FAR!!! OMG i found out i was 4th highest in the class for mi exams :O! I was so chuffed!! but id dint beat cappy or woody :(!
    Well i best go and make some exam papers up :0 dnt ask!
    Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Well the shows went gr8 as u kno :P! 
On sunday i didnt do much!  I actualli sat down on mi bum on mi computer all day chattin to Stu then Tom the Stu and Tom then Stu agen lol!  Well it was fun doing nothing.  I would of done coursework but i didnt have any to do.  Well i d now :P! 
I need to say HAPPY BIRTHDAY to mi best m8 Hanisa! I luv u chick sorri ur card and prezzie is in the post to Malaysia!! Hope you had a gr8 day and il talk to ya soon!
Anyway Monday was a complete drag!  I went bak to lessons but they werent very good.  English wasnt that gr8 since all we talked about is bloody puncutaion.  What are we 10? Science was fun ... not!!! It was a pile of crap! All we did in Physics was a stupid experiment.  Well atleast it aint work.  Double PE was mint...coz i did no work at all!  Me and Stewy just chatted for an ghour... the first hour i sat n revised but it was funni wiv nic!
Last nite wasnt good as i kipped ost of the nite...then stayed up untill 2.30 doin mi webbie.  I fell asleep and missed Hollyoaks, Eastenders and Coronation Street :( Nem mind lol!
Today is mine and cookies one month anniversary!  But hes unfortunatley hes in florida havin a gd time while im here bored out mi skull at skool  now its dinner time!
This morning i had Maths which was orite i got 41 out of 100 which is a D :( but i got more than ash and laura and Kaylz :O i was like OMG! We went over the answers and i missed a few marks by mi careless mistakes as usual.
English was crap coz all we talked about was poerty and coursework :( which was canni borin...plsu Kaylz isnt in :(  Shes gone to Glasgow for her GC gig...hope she enjys ehrself since shes off today and tomorra :P  I just had Humanities where all we did was exam questions so theres nout to write about lol!
Well best go for dinner!

Luv ya

Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
On thrusday i did nout! I tried to finish my humanities coursewoirk off...i did! Well i did once i got home on the nite.  Ask tom and big boy ;) I was up till 12.30 doin it! Then mi ink ran out so mi dad had to print them out on his compyter.  I was absolutley shattered.
Yesterday was a complete and utter bore!  At skool nothin much happened...but i handed in my HUmanities coursework and miss sed it luks like a B!!!! Yay im soo chuffed! So hopefulli if i revise i may get an A! Doubt it tho! Anyway Friday i was at the Studio for like git 4 :O I was like OMG!  Anyway i watched everyone being the best they could :( the rehearsal was ok but ppl kept messin it up! I was soo annoyed!
Today was fabbie! It was sooo sunni walking round the town! We were signing and dancing/skipping down the road(well i wasnt)... as usual! Then these lasses clld us all freaks! OMG Ashley...she was like u lukin in a mirror>..shes 10 :O!! Bless a! The 2nd show went better coz theyre was more audience participation...loadz of kiddiez wasnt last nite! There must of onli been 20 ppl there this afternoon :P
Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Well Monday was a complete drag!
I went to skool bein bored out mi skull and no1 came to c me as per usual!  Wat is the point of not comin out!
Tuesday was ok! It was canni crap in tha mornin tho but went to watch the danz in PE i missing cats and the danz is mega!!
Last nite was ok! Got too se lil tia ami rachel and lil jasmine was there copyin everythin her sis amy did bless a!
Today has been completley n utterly crap! Kim wants to watch her bak!
Anyway Kaylz n Kaz had a fite bout this txt i got off tom but we were onli chattin then she made a fuss about nobody likin a! WATEVA KAZ!

I miss Cookie soo much!! Hes went away this mornin all the way in florida :(

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Today has been quite borin...but i have mi comp back in mi room! Finalli!!!  Its wwhere it belongs and i can stay up as long as i wnt ;)!!
I got up at like 11 with a bit ov a hangova :P oops he he but i dont care! I cant wait to go to skool tomorra... takin me camera in to skool to take some piccies of tha gang for mi sweet and sexci boyfriend cookie lmao!!
Hmmm wat else? Oh yea Katy had to go to da coppa station coz of dat incident last year!!
Oh yesterday i nearli fell asleep on the keyboard to 3 different lads :O i felt soo bad. Sorri Anthony Stu n Si for nearli fallin a kip on da cam! He he i was so tired! I had 11 hours sleep :o :p
I luv COOKIE 4eva n eva! No-1 can change that!!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
OMG IM SO HAPPI!!!!!!

MI NOSE IS FINALLI STRAIGHT AND i feel ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS!!

I DONT CARE WHAT KYM THINKS COZ SHE HAS THE WORST EYES U CAN HAVE!!!!!!!! WATCH YA BACK KYM!!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
     OMG had the best weekend! When did i sign this last? hmm...wednesday!
Well skool was absolutely gr8! I luved to see mi m8s agen! Especialli thrusday.  
     Brunton took me through to LA which i h8!! Id rather be in lessons like! Laura came to see me first lesson coz she was sent to do revision.  bnut she sat wiv me and we chatted...whilst workin :P Then brunton came out wiv me which was funny...all we did was chatted about KIM fish STIMPSON... shes got hoover marks...not hickies lmao!! Everyone came to see me at break which was mega fun!!! Then i went up to english.  We watched a realli borin film but it was ok coz we just laffed...as usual. Then in Art kim started.  Brunton nearli bashed her...i wish she did or i did...Kim is such a bitch.  Anyway the afternoon was canni borin like!
     On Friday it was soooooooooo borin at skool.  I went to tutorial but i wish i didnt.It was a pile of crap! Anyway all day was realli reali borin.  No-one came out! Kim got a new fone out in Art so Laura was like giz a luk.  She was like ner...! God its onli a fone! Laura went wat coz its a brick and she went ner loadz of ppl have this fone...yea years ago! Laura was like i cant be arsed to mess wiv ya.  It was soo amazing id never ehard Laura ave a go at Kim like that.  Anyway kim went off in a rage as usual!
     Anyway last nite was the bomb!! It was absolutley gr8 to be out.  We went to tha cinema to see hitch. It was a realli funni spec when he kicked her off the ped! Lmao!  We saw Gemma...Davena...Rachel...Kristanne and Rachel D there too.  We were in the same screen but i had to sit on the seats on the florr coz i cudnt get up the stairs.  It finished at 11 and we were there till 11.35 coz her dad came for us...lol Laura!
     Wen we got home we watched Comic Releif.  We were nearli cryin wen all the lil children were cryin and then happi.  It felt so bad that i had a famili and a roof and they had hardli had nethin!! Boohoo!!!
     We got up at like 9 this mornin coz we didnt get to sleep till about 2.30 but Stacey and her friends were awake mst of the night.  They wouldnt shut up!!! I was like uhhh for gods sake! lmao!!
    Well best go mi dinners readi!
Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Heya! Well todays been ok! Ive been doin mi work since 11.30 am this mornin till about 4.30.  It was soo borin! 
Anyway now im drinkin me bacardi breezer but i may have another one! I will probabli be in hyper mode tomorra at skool coz i normalli am.  Its like a substituting a hangover for hyperness lmao!!
Well g2g pack me bag for tomorra!
If Kaz reads this im sorri ok i had a bad day!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y15/Becki_Danny_Lass/BEZZIES.jpg

Heya peeps!
       Well ive been workin on mi humanities coursework all day!  Ive done chapter 1 to chapter 3 finished and im in the middle of the holocaust one.  Its sooo anoying! Ive had this work for ages and i couldn't be arsed to do it.  Im bak to skool tomorra! Cant wait to see Kaylz and Laura! I wish i cud go upstairs to english to see every1! I miss Fishy and Shaun(dnt tell em)and the lases ov course.
       Bless cookie is sdtill at coll doin his art for the open evenin. Hes been there since 2.30 and still there.  I feel sorri for mi baby lmao!
      Anyway mi mam and dad r goin out tonite to see Colin Fry at the Empire! YAY!!  Hopefulli sazzie will come ova if shes not too busi!  Its been SOOOO borin today.  It realli has lmao!
      Goin to skool 2moz tho so i can see every1 agen! YES!!!!
      Oh BTW thanx for bein there 4 me! I realli appreciate it!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
Had a realli shitti day today! Found out that mi mam may not get better which is takin a big chunk out of me tonite! I was in such a rage wiv every1! Now Kaz aint speakin to me coz of mi stupid mouth :( And im just annoyed that she hasnt come to see me when every1 has made the effort to ring me or call round! I just feel realli left out at home! Not gettin all the normal gossip i normalli do!
Anyway the panto is onli next week and ive onli learnt the first 10 pages of the full script! I need to put all the songs in and all the notes so i can remember wat to do and stuff!
Mi cast is signed finalli :P Every1 from dance has signed it! hers a list:
= Amanda

Il be ok now that im calm and bein cheered up by stu is makin me feel soo much better! I Just wish Han were here too :( MISS U SOOOO MUCH HANISA!!!!!!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
          I got up at 9.30 because i couldnt be bothered to get out of bed!  I found out yesterday that i could go back to skool tomorra!!
          Last nite i got mi hair cut! I got all mi layers put back in and it looks abosluely lush! I couldn't go to watch Gemma + Sarah + Lynz + Ash coz Katy didnt go so i was allowed on mi own! But then i went to mi students class alone :@! It was probabli the time because thats wen Nicola was supposed to come!
          Anyway i got plans for all this week! Yay!! Today i am goin to watch all the lil ones dance when Katy goes since i cant teach no more :(  Then i will be able to see Amanda + Mica the gr8st gurliez on earth! Lmao! On wednesday mi mam + dad are off out to see Colin Fry! I hope mi Grandad comes through coz i miss him so much and i want to know if hes ok and stuff!  But i will be in wiv Katy but she'll be upstairs! 
        On Thursday Laura is coming round to see me after skool! But i WILL be back to skool then anyways(i hope)! Mi dad says tomorra but i'd rather go on Thursday coz Wed is sooo borin wiv bloody Business Studies wiv Miss Pegg :@! BORING!
       Then on friday im goin to Laura's after skool!! Were off to see Hide and Seek i fink!! Then im goin to kip at hers. Its goin to be soo much fun! I ahvent seen her in 3 weeks or any ov the others for that matter! Kaz and Kaylz maybe droppin round after skool next week so that shud be fun!!
      Well i best be off! Got loadz of coursework to do before thursday!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
      Tonite was fabbie @ dance!!  I went to mi students class!! It was mega fun! There was onli me and jenny and trish but vicky WAS supposed to come and she TOLD Jenny she was...wat a loser! This week is being realli eventful!!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
        I just got bak from the hospital and i now have a yucki colour blue shoe!!
        To start the day off the heatings broke so its realli realli cold!! Im freezing just sitting here! I can hardli type very well! It is sooo cold! I got up and it was absoluteli freezin!!! Anyway last night we had toast coz of the cooker is on the blink! OOh its so annoyin!!  First taste of warmness! Guess wat? its toast :@ uhhh!
        Well i better be off got LOADZ of revision to do!!! Plus i have missed poetry - not that i like it - but i have to catch up!!
        
Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
     Im soooo annoyed wiv Drama!! Its realli annoyin!  Everythin we do its gotta be Kym or Lynz or Rachel (rachels the gr8est she deserves it) gettin the lead part in EVERYTHING!! T n T say dont be bitches behind ppls backs but i cnt help it!! Kym is such a bitch! Just coz she lives near Trina and always gets lifts from her dont mean shes the BEST! They shud give other ppl a go at things! Like Amanda shes stuck as a slave wiv Paige(ew) and fay + Kate(hu r gr8)Amanda is sooo talented and is always left to the bottom ov everythin!  I kno Mica has the king part and its god but i dnt think she or Amanda r happi wiv verythin!  Neither am i!!
    Anyway ive quit drama! From now on il just have to go to Cheerleadin and i wont do the pantomime either, i have plenty stuff to do than turn up on a weekend to practice it!  I d rather be out wiv mi friends bowlin or shoppin or summit!
    Anyway its been realli borin and i wnt be able to speak to cookie till thurs coz were busi :( i realli luv im tho :P Hes the lushest lad ever!
    Tomorra im off to the hospital for mi x-ray! I hope i dnt have to have another cast on becoz it makes me sik :(  Mi mums got her op tomorra too so i gotta be up earli!
    Well mist be off!! Mi babes has just txt me to remind me of tha thing on TV!! I luv him to bitzzz!!

Luv ya
Becki
xxx

Heya peeps!
   Well im off to rehearsal! Im signin mi death wish! Its goin to be sooo borin coz im onli nthat prompt! But i promised mi gurliez i wud be there for their needs!! I dunno wether to take some work just incase i mean when im bored! But im sure we'll have a laff with everythin! LMAO!!
   Well i best be off!!

Luv ya
Becki
